name: npd-app
description: This codebase is several projects wrapped into one, and the script to build them all together automatically is a work in progress.  Includes:

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:npdLegWidget" --restart-after 15000
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:main" "npm run build:widgets"
scripts.prune: concurrently "npm run prune:server" "npm run prune:main" "npm run prune:widgets"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run prune && rimraf ./server && rimraf ./widgets

author: Will McVay
